Package ro.ubb.olympics.domain.validators

Interface Validator<T>

Type Parameters:
T - type of entity to be validated
All Known Implementing Classes:
AthleteValidator, CompetitionValidator, ParticipationValidator, SponsorshipValidator, SponsorValidator
public interface Validator<T>
Generic validator interface.

    static java.lang.String EXCEPTION_MESSAGE_SEPARATOR

    • EXCEPTION_MESSAGE_SEPARATOR

      static final java.lang.String EXCEPTION_MESSAGE_SEPARATOR
      Separator for building sequences of error messages when validating an entity.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • validateProperty

      static <T> void validateProperty​(T property, java.util.function.Predicate<T> predicate, java.lang.String invalidFieldErrorMessage, java.lang.StringBuilder errorMessageBuilder)
      Validates a property given a predicate. If the property is invalid, an error message is appended to an error message builder.
      Type Parameters:
      T - generic type parameter
      Parameters:
      property - the property to be validated
      predicate - the predicate for which the property will be checked against
      invalidFieldErrorMessage - the message to be added to the error message builder
      errorMessageBuilder - the error message builder to which error messages are appended

    • validateNonNull

      static <T> void validateNonNull​(T object, java.lang.String exceptionMessage) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Checks whether an object is null. If it is, throws an exception with a given message.
      Type Parameters:
      T - generic type parameter
      Parameters:
      object - the object to be checked if it is null
      exceptionMessage - the exception message
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the object is null

    • validateNonNull

      static <T> void validateNonNull​(T object) throws ValidatorException
      Checks whether an object is null. If it is, throws an exception with a predefined message.
      Type Parameters:
      T - generic type parameter
      Parameters:
      object - the object to be checked if it is null
      Throws:
      ValidatorException - if the object is null

    • validateDoesNotThrowException

      static void validateDoesNotThrowException​(java.lang.Runnable runnable, java.lang.String errorMessage, java.lang.StringBuilder errorMessageBuilder)
      Check whether a method call throws an exception. If it does, an error message is appended to an error message builder.
      Parameters:
      runnable - the method call to be made.
      errorMessage - the message to be added to the error message builder
      errorMessageBuilder - the error message builder to which error messages are appended

    • validate

      void validate​(T entity) throws ValidatorException
      Validates an entity.
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to be validated
      Throws:
      ValidatorException - if the entity is not valid
